body:
tsan ci job is often timing out or failing : 

```
FAILED   test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua @ 2505: TUI has no black flicker when clearing regions during startup with termguicolors
test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua:2528: Row 1 did not match.
Expected:
  |*^                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |                                                   |
Actual:
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey2:^                                                   }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey3, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey3:[No Name]                        0,0-1          All}|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey2:                                                   }|
  |                                                   |

To print the expect() call that would assert the current screen state, use
screen:snapshot_util(). In case of non-deterministic failures, use
screen:redraw_debug() to show all intermediate screen states.

Snapshot:
screen:add_extra_attr_ids({
  [31] = { background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey2 },
  [32] = { background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey4 },
  [33] = { background = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey3, foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey3 },
})

screen:expect([[
  {31:^                                                   }|
  {32:~                                                  }|*7
  {33:[No Name]                        0,0-1          All}|
  {31:                                                   }|
                                                     |
]])

stack traceback:
	test/functional/ui/screen.lua:853: in function '_wait'
	test/functional/ui/screen.lua:517: in function 'expect'
	test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua:2528: in function <test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua:2505>
```

labels.description: automation for build, test, and release
labels.name: ci

title: tsan ci job is often timing out or failing

type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality
type.name: Enhancement
